Description: Iconic representation of concept or asset. Icons have uniform size.
Name: Icon

Description: State indicator to be used on top of icons.
Name: Badge

Description: Other graphic element, e.g, page banner.
Name: Graphic

Description: Iconic representation of interaction. May have idiosyncratic sizes.
Name: Interaction Icon

Description: Graphic used to draw interaction widget, e.g., down-arrow in scroll-bar or dropdown menu.
Name: Widget Graphic
